title: Email of the Day
post: Perhaps we should stop boasting with the term peer reviewed. We cause people to laugh at shroud science. .
author: Paulette

title: Email of the Day
post: Peer reviewed means the paper can be accepted for consideration, not that what is proposed is gospel truth and Shroudies have had problems with peer-reviewed Shroud papers, Shroud books and so on. One can be sure that the ecclesiastical authorities in Turin and Rome know about this and now more care has to be taken with what is published in Shroud newsletters and websites. Why? Because it seems that in these cases the left hand there does not know what the right hand is doing. This is not conducive to producing reliable Shroud studies, to attracting academics and to winning the confidence of those who decide in Rome.
author: Louis
